title: ConTeXt
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724062454/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724062454/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : [Design Applications](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724062454/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Design%20Applications) : ConTeXt**

ConTeXt is a document preparation system based on the [TeX](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724062454/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TeX) typesetting program. Being more recent than the other main [TeX](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724062454/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TeX) macro package, [LaTeX](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724062454/http:/typophile.com/wiki/LaTeX), it is both more modular in its conception and more monolithic in its building.

This system was developed from 1990 by Hans Hagen from PRAGMA Advanced Document Engineering (Pragma ADE), a Netherlands-based company.

For more on ConTeXt, see the wiki:

[http://wiki.contextgarden.net/Main\_Page](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724062454/http:/wiki.contextgarden.net/Main_Page "http://wiki.contextgarden.net/Main\_Page")
author: ishamid
